resources

Class ResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • resources.ResourceManager

  • public class ResourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the loaded models, textures and splines.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  ResourceManager.ResourceState

        Throws:

        Sets the resources' update time period to the given value.
        Parameters:
        updatePeriod - the resources' update time period
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - update period can't be negative

      • changeTextureFiltering

        public static void changeTextureFiltering()
        Changes all texture's (that implements EasyFiltering) filtering based on what you set in Settings.
        See Also:
        EasyFiltering, Settings.getTextureFiltering()

      • changeTextureColorSpace

        public static void changeTextureColorSpace()
        Changes all texture's (that implements ChangableColorSpace) color space based on what you set in Settings.
        See Also:
        ChangableColorSpace, Settings.getGamma()

      • getTextureData

        @NotNull
 @ReadOnly
public static org.joml.Vector3i getTextureData()
        Returns data about the textures. The x coordinate means the number of usable textures, the y means the data size in bytes, stored in the RAM, the z means the data size in bytes, stored in the ACTION.
        Returns:
        data about the textures
